quote.body: He who controls the past controls the future. He who controls the present controls the past.
quote.by: George Orwell, from the book "1984" or "Nineteen Eighty-Four"

quote.body: The most effective way to destroy people is to deny and obliterate their own understanding of their history.
If you want a picture of the future, imagine a boot stamping on a human faceâ€”for ever.
quote.by: George Orwell, from the book "1984" or "Nineteen Eighty-Four"
